recipe.title: Fresh Cranberry Sauce
ingredients: 1 (12-ounce) package Ocean Spray® Fresh or Frozen Cranberries
instructions: Combine sugar and water in a medium saucepan. Bring to boil; add cranberries, return to boil. Reduce heat and boil gently for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cover and cool completely at room temperature. Refrigerate until serving time.
This recipe is made available as a courtesy by Ocean Spray Cranberries, Inc.
